00020 #ifndef _POSIX_THREAD_H
00021 #define _POSIX_THREAD_H
00022 
00023 #include <posix/internal.h>
00024 
00025 typedef unsigned long long pse51_sigset_t;
00026 
00027 struct mm_struct;
00028 
00029 struct pse51_hkey {
00030 
00031     unsigned long u_tid;
00032     struct mm_struct *mm;
00033 };
00034 
00035 typedef struct {
00036     pse51_sigset_t mask;
00037     xnpqueue_t list;
00038 } pse51_sigqueue_t;
00039 
00040 struct pse51_thread {
00041     unsigned magic;
00042     xnthread_t threadbase;
00043 
00044 #define thread2pthread(taddr) ({                                        \
00045     xnthread_t *_taddr = (taddr);                                       \
00046     (_taddr                                                             \
00047     ? ((xnthread_get_magic(_taddr) == PSE51_SKIN_MAGIC)                 \
00048        ? ((pthread_t)(((char *)_taddr)- offsetof(struct pse51_thread,   \
00049                                                  threadbase)))          \
00050        : NULL)                                                          \
00051     : NULL);                                                            \
00052 })
00053 
00054 
00055     xnholder_t link;    /* Link in pse51_threadq */
00056     
00057 #define link2pthread(laddr) \
00058     ((pthread_t)(((char *)laddr) - offsetof(struct pse51_thread, link)))
00059     
00060 
00061     pthread_attr_t attr;        /* creation attributes */
00062 
00063     void *(*entry)(void *arg);  /* start routine */
00064     void *arg;                  /* start routine argument */
00065 
00066     /* For pthread_join */
00067     void *exit_status;
00068     xnsynch_t join_synch;       /* synchronization object, used by other threads
00069                                    waiting for this one to finish. */
00070 
00071     /* For pthread_cancel */
00072     unsigned cancelstate : 2;
00073     unsigned canceltype : 2;
00074     unsigned cancel_request : 1;
00075     xnqueue_t cleanup_handlers_q;
00076 
00077     /* errno value for this thread. */
00078     int err;
00079 
00080     /* For signals handling. */
00081     pse51_sigset_t sigmask;     /* signals mask. */
00082     pse51_sigqueue_t pending;   /* Pending signals */
00083     pse51_sigqueue_t blocked_received; /* Blocked signals received. */
00084 
00085     /* For thread specific data. */
00086     const void *tsd [PTHREAD_KEYS_MAX];
00087 
00088     /* For timers. */
00089     xnqueue_t timersq;
00090     
00091 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE)
00092     struct pse51_hkey hkey;
00093 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00094 };
00095 
00096 #define PSE51_JOINED_DETACHED XNTHREAD_SPARE0
00097 
00098 #define pse51_current_thread() thread2pthread(xnpod_current_thread())
00099 
00100 static inline void thread_set_errno (int err)
00101 {
00102     *xnthread_get_errno_location() = err;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static inline int thread_get_errno (void)
00106 {
00107     return *xnthread_get_errno_location();
00108 }
00109 
00110 #define thread_name(thread) ((thread)->attr.name)
00111 
00112 #define thread_exit_status(thread) ((thread)->exit_status)
00113 
00114 #define thread_getdetachstate(thread) ((thread)->attr.detachstate)
00115 
00116 #define thread_setdetachstate(thread, state) ((thread)->attr.detachstate=state)
00117 
00118 #define thread_getcancelstate(thread) ((thread)->cancelstate)
00119 
00120 #define thread_setcancelstate(thread, state) ((thread)->cancelstate=state)
00121 
00122 #define thread_setcanceltype(thread, type) ((thread)->canceltype=type)
00123 
00124 #define thread_getcanceltype(thread) ((thread)->canceltype)
00125 
00126 #define thread_clrcancel(thread) ((thread)->cancel_request = 0)
00127 
00128 #define thread_setcancel(thread) ((thread)->cancel_request = 1)
00129 
00130 #define thread_cleanups(thread) (&(thread)->cleanup_handlers_q)
00131 
00132 #define thread_gettsd(thread, key) ((thread)->tsd[key])
00133 
00134 #define thread_settsd(thread, key, value) ((thread)->tsd[key]=(value))
00135 
00136 void pse51_thread_abort(pthread_t thread, void *status);
00137 
00138 static inline void thread_cancellation_point (xnthread_t *thread)
00139 {
00140     pthread_t cur = thread2pthread(thread);
00141     
00142     if(cur && cur->cancel_request
00143         && thread_getcancelstate(cur) == PTHREAD_CANCEL_ENABLE )
00144         pse51_thread_abort(cur, PTHREAD_CANCELED);
00145 }

00148 
00149 void pse51_thread_pkg_cleanup(void);

00151 /* round-robin period. */
00152 extern xnticks_t pse51_time_slice;
00153 
00154 /* threads list */
00155 extern xnqueue_t pse51_threadq;
